attributes.action: All members of the government to be vaccinated!
attributes.additional_details: A Mockery has been made of the NHS. Firstly telling them they were the hero’s and they were needed more than ever! Now 2 years on and basically told they’re not needed anymore if they don’t do what they’re saying and take the jab! This shouldn’t be forced upon people and risk them losing their jobs. More so waiting until “after” the winter pressures. If it was needed so badly why not try and make then have it before? The health care service is already on its knees and losing that many staff would have crippled the NHS. I think it’s only fair if we have to follow the no jab no job policy the so should the ones who have implamented it!!
attributes.background: All members of the government to be fully vaccinated or lose there jobs like they have made our previous health care service.no jab no job!!!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408

You might also like to sign the following petition:

Do not make COVID vaccination a requirement for health and social care workers
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600872
